name: Haunted Nightmares
description:
“You learned to run from what you feel, and that's why you have nightmares.
To deny is to invite madness. To accept is to control.” (Megan Chance)


Haunted Nightmares is a top down game that puts you into nightmares in which you are hunted by „Shadows“.

These nightmares are your personal labyrinth. You have to know them to escape them and wake up in a "Fresh Bed" - if you can find it ...
But to find this bed (in this labyrinth with locked doors, hidden keys and all the shadows behind you ...) is not enough:
You can only wake up there, if you find the "Three Orbs of Beautiful Memories", hidden in these nightmares.

If a "shadow" spots you, it will hunt you - it will not give up !
And no matter how many chase you, you have to find a way out of your nightmare.
Once discovered - no way to hide … So you have to run…

And you will be discovered - as it always is in nightmares.

The question is how well do you know your nightmares - your personal nightly labyrinth.

If you get to know your dreams, you will find a place to awaken peacefully.
Despite all the doors, hidden keys, wrong ways and sticky soil.

Maybe it won't always be easy. But a mastered nightmare will never haunt you again.

KEY ELEMENTS


  • Find the hidden "Three Orbs of Beautiful Memories"
  • Find the right keys for the right doors - don't open the wrong ones
  • And try desperately to get out of this nightmare - despite the ongoing haunting 
  • Keep an eye on your stamina - you can't run forever
  • Keep an eye on your vitality - the "shadows" will try to steal it from you
